subject: Fwd: A shipment from order #SSN5603 has been delivered
description_text:
Hello --

I received my order just now and it doesn't appear to include the haptics
reactor set. Is this coming separately? If the incorrect set was mailed,
could I have the haptics mailed to be separately?

Here is a picture of what I received.



Thank you,
Quan

conversations.body_text: Hi Quan Nguyen,  I’ll check with our operations team—it’s possible that the VAM Pro motors were temporarily out of stock and therefore shipped separately.

Thank you. If you could please provide a tracking number, I would really
appreciate it. FedEx always delivers to the incorrect address, so I usually
need to grab the package from my neighbor.

On Fri, Jan 9, 2026 at 7:47 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Quan Nguyen,    We apologize for the delayed response; we've just returned from vacation. Here is your shipping tracking link. This product has been out of stock for nearly two weeks due to overwhelming demand. We'll ship it out within the next couple of days and sincerely apologize for the delay.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047224805493
